sounds.name: Update 2
sounds.text: Your warriors have engaged the enemy.

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: DOOM to ALL who threaten the homeworld!

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: *beep beep* Drop your weapon—you have fifteen seconds to comply.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: Five, four, three two one *Phase Disruptor blast*

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: I see you have an appetite for destruction.

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: And you learn to use your illusion.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: But I find your lack of control disturbing.

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: It all looks so different on this side.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: They should have sent a poet.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: Do not provoke me to violence.

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: You could no more evade my wrath…

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: I sense a soul in search of answers.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: It sounds like a… *ach* a huge, gargantuan, swollen, bloated mushroom!

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: One small step for man, one giant… *static* STOP POKING ME!

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: In the Age of Chaos, two factions battle for dominance.

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: Warcraft Zwei, jetzt als exklusivedition mit dem expansion set, four boostern und zauberlehrbuch…

sounds.name: Ready
sounds.text: It is a good day to die.

sounds.name: Affirmation 4
sounds.text: I thought you'd see it my way.

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: Look at all the… pretty lights.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: I wonder what this button does? *button push* *alarms*

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: *alarms* I think this was a… BIG mistake!

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: When the moon… is in the seventh house…

sounds.name: Annoyance 7
sounds.text: What did you do to your hair?

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: We sense a soul in search of answers.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: Do you seek knowledge of time travel?

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: We'll take that as a yes.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: And now for your first lesson. *laughing*

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: *rapid replay of previous lines backwards* …Do you seek knowledge of time travel?

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: Command, or you will be relieved.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: This is not an idle threat.

sounds.name: Acknowledgement 3
sounds.text: What would you ask of me?

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: For the Khala is my strength!

sounds.name: Acknowledgement 3
sounds.text: What would you ask of me?

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: For the Khala is my strength!

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: I don't have time for games!

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: I was Executor long before you.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: So do not try my patience!

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: I don't have time for games!

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: I was Executor long before you.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: So do not try my patience!

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: You have persecuted us for generations…

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: And now you beg us to aid you?

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: We will do what we must.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: But we do it for Aiur—not you.

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: What do I look like—an Orc?

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: This is not Warcraft in space!
